casebody.data:
No. COA15-195. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. May 10, 2016.

In the Matter of the Foreclosure of a Deed of Trust Executed by John Paul SMITH1 Dated November 10, 2007 and Recorded in Book RB 913 at page 432 in the Columbus County Public Registry, North Carolina.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Reversed and Remanded.
